entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story. He is described as plummeting towards the Horntail and getting grazed by one of its spikes.

entities.name: horntail
entities.description: A dragon that Harry is trying to navigate around. It has a long neck, yellow eyes, and is protective of its eggs.

relationships.description: Harry is trying to navigate around the Horntail, which has its eyes on him and is protective of its eggs.
The Horntail is described as being protective of its eggs, which are not explicitly mentioned but implied to be nearby.
